```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
#read in data

ces=read.csv(here("data","ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

# Create ggplot


```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x = white, y = ces_3_0_score)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "% White", y = "CalEnviro Pollution Burden Score")


```
